name: Featherfang
description: The Featherfang is unique among Terpiez for having feathers on its teeth, which is how it gets its name. It is a filter feeder, with its tooth-feathers capturing gnats and mosquitoes, though it also likes cinnamon-sugar dust from breakfast cereals. Featherfangs vocalize through their teeth, producing a sound very similar to that of an oboe.
